Package votebox.middle.view.widget

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IButtonStrategy
    Buttons delegate the behavior that is executed when they are clicked to an instance of IButtonStrategy.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AButtonState
    Buttons delegate to an instance of this state class.
    ALabelState  
    AToggleButtonGroupStrategy
    This class encapsulates the notion of the strategy which a toggle button group uses to determine whether or not to accept a toggle button's request to either select itself or deselect itself.
    AToggleButtonState
    This class deifnes the abstract state for a ToggleButton (used in state pattern).
    Button
    Buttons, like labels, are defined in the ballot layout.
    DefaultButtonState
    This is the button state which is "default," or is the state that the button is in when it is not currently being focused on.
    DefaultLabelState  
    DefaultToggleButtonState
    This class represents the default (neither focused nor selected) state of a ToggleButton
    FocusableLabel
    This is the simplest implementation of an IDrawable.
    FocusedButtonState
    This is the
    FocusedLabelState  
    FocusedSelectedToggleButtonState
    This class represents the focused+selected (the button is both focused on and currently selected) state of a ToggleButton.
    FocusedToggleButtonState
    This class represents the focused state of a ToggleButton.
    Label
    This is the simplest implementation of an IDrawable.
    LanguageSelect
    This strategy defines the behavior for a toggle button group whose purpose is to select the language that is being used.
    NavigationLinks
    This class encapsulates the links that a focusable uses to determine who gets the focus when it is pushed away from a focusable in any given direction.
    Race
    This strategy interprets toggle buttons as being candidates in a given race in the model.
    RadioButton
    This strategy encapsulates the behavior expected with radio buttons.
    SelectedToggleButtonState
    This class represents the focused state of a ToggleButton.
    ToggleButton
    A ToggleButton is a focusable label whose select behavior represents "toggle." For the purposes of ToggleButtons that represent candidates in races, toggling can be thought of as the voter's expression of preference.
    ToggleButtonGroup  
    WriteInToggleButton  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    UnknownStrategyException
    This exception is thrown when the strategy defined by a propery is unknown.
